flavor: You imbue the weapon with psychic power.

magic.label: Mental (Magic)
magic.level-4-spells: The weapon can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.R8bqnYiThB6MYTxD]{Phantom Pain} once per day.
magic.level-6-spells: The weapon can cast 2nd rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.R8bqnYiThB6MYTxD]{Phantom Pain} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.kIwA7kwp5E0AC3yM]{Warrior's Regret} once per day, but not both.
magic.level-8-spells: The weapon can cast 3rd rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.R8bqnYiThB6MYTxD]{Phantom Pain} and 3rd rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.kIwA7kwp5E0AC3yM]{Warrior's Regret} once per day each.
magic.level-12-spells: The weapon can cast 4th rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.R8bqnYiThB6MYTxD]{Phantom Pain}, 4th rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.kIwA7kwp5E0AC3yM]{Warrior's Regret} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.tlcrVRqW1MSKJ5IC]{Phantasmal Killer} once per day each.
magic.level-16-spells: The weapon can cast 6th rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.R8bqnYiThB6MYTxD]{Phantom Pain},  6th rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.tlcrVRqW1MSKJ5IC]{Phantasmal Killer} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.0XP2XOxT9VSiXFDr]{Phantasmal Calamity} once per day each.
magic.level-20-weird: The weapon can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.qDjeG6dxT4aEEC6J]{Weird} once per day.

might.label: Mental (Might)
might.level-10-stupefied: On a critical hit, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} for 1 round.
might.level-12-resistance: The mental damage dealt by this imbued property ignores resistances.
might.level-16-stupefied: On a critical hit, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} for 1 round.
might.level-20-weakness: On a successful Strike with the weapon, before applying mental damage, the target gains weakness 1 to mental until the beginning of your next turn.

tech.label: Mental (Technique)
tech.level-8-stupefied: On a critical hit, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} for 1 round.
tech.level-12-resistance: The mental damage dealt by this imbued property (including persistent mental damage) ignores resistances.
tech.level-16-stupefied: On a critical hit, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} for 1 round.
tech.level-20-weakness: While the foe has persistent mental damage from the this imbued property, the stupefied condition from a critical hit lasts until the persistent damage ends or for 1 round, whichever is longer.
